experience.title: Blockchain Developer
experience.description: â— Worked on an NFT marketplace on Ethereum and a substrate-based parachain, enabling users to create, buy, and sell digital assets securely.â— Created and maintained a Node.js server to facilitate the migration of tokens from the Ethereum blockchain to a substrate-based chain, ensuring seamless interoperability and data integrity.

experience.title: Blockchain Developer
experience.description: â— Designed and implemented smart contracts for an NFT marketplace, including an integrated exchange platform and staking contracts for NFT staking.â— Researched and developed a proof of concept (PoC) using the Polygon PoS bridge and Wormhole bridge, enhancing cross-chain asset transfer and interoperability.â— Conducted extensive testing of smart contracts using Hardhat and Ethers.js, and integrated front-end components for comprehensive testing and user experience optimization.
